data.title: Abraham Kuyper (Part 2): Church Reformer and Educator
data.meta_description: Abraham Kuyper played a crucial role in the church reform movement known as the "Aggrieved Ones". He also advanced Christian education by his political support for parent-run Christian day schools and his founding of the Free University in Amsterdam. https://youtu.be/JbHRdfOfoHs
data.text:
Abraham Kuyper played a crucial role in the church reform movement known as the “Aggrieved Ones”. He also advanced Christian education by his political support for parent-run Christian day schools and his founding of the Free University in Amsterdam.

Nathan Brummel is Professor of Systematic Theology and New Testament at Divine Hope Reformed Bible Seminary. He is a minister in the United Reformed Churches of North America.
